desc: Ultra Chiller builds Cool Suits and Cool Suit Systems for race car drivers. Our personal cooling systems are high quality and high performance. Contact us for advice on the best personal cooling system for your racing application. We work with NASA, SCCA, Lucas Oil Offroad Racing Series and many more.

layout.text: Your Secret to Staying Safe and Winning More Races..

That Keeps You Cool And Then Gives You An Edge on Your Competition!
